column1: This widget forms the Videos tab on the Store Profile and displays the videos of the Store. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Store Profile.
column2: This widget forms the Videos tab on the Showroom Profile and displays the videos of the Showroom. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of a Store\'s most commented videos. This widget should be placed on the Store Profile.
column2: Displays list of a Showroom\'s most commented videos. This widget should be placed on the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of a Store\'s most recent videos. This widget should be placed on the Store Profile.
column2: Displays list of a Showroom\'s most recent videos. This widget should be placed on the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of a Store\'s top rated videos. This widget should be placed on the Store Profile.
column2: Displays list of a Showroom\'s top rated videos. This widget should be placed on the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of a Store\'s most liked videos. This widget should be placed on the Store Profile.
column2: Displays list of a Showroom\'s most liked videos. This widget should be placed on the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of store’s featured videos. This widget should be placed on the Store Profile.
column2: Displays list of Showroom’s featured videos. This widget should be placed on the Showroom Profile.

column1: Displays list of Store\'s featured videos.
column2: Displays list of Showroom\'s featured videos.

column1: Displays the form for searching Store Videos on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.
column2: Displays the form for searching Showroom Videos on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.

column1: Choose the fields that you want to be available in the Search Store Videos form widget.
column2: Choose the fields that you want to be available in the Search Showroom Videos form widget.

column1: Displays the list of Videos from Stores created on your community. This widget should be placed in the widgetized Store Videos store. Results from the Search Store Videos form are also shown here.
column2: Displays the list of Videos from Showrooms created on your community. This widget should be placed in the widgetized Showroom Videos Showroom. Results from the Search Showroom Videos form are also shown here.

column1: Displays the Videos from Paid Stores. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Videos from Paid Showrooms. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays Featured Store Videos. You can mark Store Videos as Featured from the “Manage Store Videos” section in the Admin Panel of this extension. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays Featured Showroom Videos. You can mark Showroom Videos as Featured from the “Manage Showroom Videos” section in the Admin Panel of this extension. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays the Most Commented Store Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Most Commented Showroom Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays the Most Viewed Store Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Most Viewed Showroom Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays the Most Liked Store Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Most Liked Showroom Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: Displays the Top Rated Store Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
column2: Displays the Top Rated Showroom Videos. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

column1: This widget should be placed on the Store Video View Store.
column2: This widget should be placed on the Showroom Video View Showroom.

column1: Displays a list of other Store Videos that the people who liked this Store Video also liked. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Store Video View Store.
column2: Displays a list of other Showroom Videos that the people who liked this Showroom Video also liked. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Showroom Video View Showroom.

column1: Displays a list of other Store Videos corresponding to the Store of which the video is being viewed. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Store Video View Store.
column2: Displays a list of other Showroom Videos corresponding to the Showroom of which the video is being viewed. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Showroom Video View Showroom.

column1: Displays Store Videos similar to the Store Video being viewed based on tags. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Store Video View Store.
column2: Displays Showroom Videos similar to the Showroom Video being viewed based on tags. You can choose the number of entries to be shown. This widget should be placed on Showroom Video View Showroom.

column1: Forms the Videos tab of your Store. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Store Profile.

column1: 'Click Add Video" to select a video from your computer. After you have selected video, click on Post Video at the bottom to begin uploading the file. Please wait while your video is being uploaded. When your upload is finished, your video will be processed - you will be notified when it is ready to be viewed."
column2: 'Click Add Video" to select a video from your computer. After you have selected video, click on Post Video at the bottom to begin uploading the file. Please wait while your video is being uploaded. When your upload is finished, your video will be processed - you will be notified when it is ready to be viewed."

column2: Ajax based Tabbed widget for Videos

column1: Below you can manage the entries for "Video of the Day" widget. To mark a video, please click on the "Add Video of the Day" link below and select the dates. If more than one videos of the day are found for a date then randomly one will be displayed.
column2: Below you can manage the entries for "Video of the Day" widget. To mark a video, please click on the "Add Video of the Day" link below and select the dates. If more than one videos of the day are found for a date then randomly one will be displayed.

column1: You should only make those videos as "Video of the Day" which have their view privacy set as 'Everyone' or 'All Registered Members'.
column2: You should only make those videos as "Video of the Day" which have their view privacy set as 'Everyone' or 'All Registered Members'.

column1: Select a start date and end date below and the corresponding Video from the auto-suggest Video field. The selected Video will be displayed as "Video of the Day" for this duration and if more than one videos are found to be displayed in the same duration then they will be dispalyed randomly one at a time.
column2: Select a start date and end date below and the corresponding Video from the auto-suggest Video field. The selected Video will be displayed as "Video of the Day" for this duration and if more than one videos are found to be displayed in the same duration then they will be dispalyed randomly one at a time.

column1: Displays featured videos in an attractive slideshow. You can set the count of the number of videos to show in this widget. If the total number of videos featured are more than that count, then the videos to be displayed will be sequentially picked up.
column2: Displays featured videos in an attractive slideshow. You can set the count of the number of videos to show in this widget. If the total number of videos featured are more than that count, then the videos to be displayed will be sequentially picked up.

column1: This widget contains an attractive AJAX based carousel, showcasing the featured videos on the site. Multiple settings of this widget makes it highly configurable.
column2: This widget contains an attractive AJAX based carousel, showcasing the featured videos on the site. Multiple settings of this widget makes it highly configurable.

column1: (number of videos to show in one row. Note: This field is applicable only when you have selected ‘Horizontal’ in ‘Carousel Type’ field.)
column2: (number of videos to show in one row. Note: This field is applicable only when you have selected ‘Horizontal’ in ‘Carousel Type’ field.)

column1: (transition interval between two slides in millisecs)
column2: (transition interval between two slides in millisecs)
